org.agreement_technologies.agents

Interface AgentListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PlanningAgent

    public interface AgentListener
    AgentListener is the interface that all planning agents must implement. These methods allow the graphical interface to get information about the planning progress.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AgentCommunication getCommunication()
      Returns the agent communication interface.
      GroundedTask getGroundedTask()
      Returns the grounded planning task.
      Landmarks getLandmarks()
      Returns the landmarks graph.
      java.lang.String getShortName()
      Returns the name of the agent (without any sufix or prefix).
      void selectPlan(java.lang.String planName)
      Notifies the state-change listener about the selection of a plan by the user.
      void setAgentListener(PlanningAgentListener paListener)
      Sets the listener for state changes of the agent.

    • Method Detail

        Returns the name of the agent (without any sufix or prefix).

        See Also:

      • setAgentListener

        void setAgentListener(PlanningAgentListener paListener)
        Sets the listener for state changes of the agent. Usually, the listener is the main graphical interface.
        Parameters:
        paListener - Listener for changes of state.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        PlanningAgentListener, GUIPlanningAgent, PlanningAgent

      • selectPlan

        void selectPlan(java.lang.String planName)
        Notifies the state-change listener about the selection of a plan by the user.
        Parameters:
        planName - Name of the selected plan.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        GUITrace, PlanningAgent
